title: Ticket #5954: URL of Chirp protocol documentation in section 6.4 is outdated
description:
The Chirp section of the manual, at 6.4, shows the following URL for the Chirp protocol documentation: http://www3.nd.edu/~ccl/software/chirp (the ~ in the link doesn't render in the PDF text). This URL is no longer valid, showing a 404.

It appears that the correct URL is now: http://ccl.cse.nd.edu/software/chirp/

The manual should be updated accordingly.
check_ins: 2019-Feb-15 14:36   Check-in [56200]: Update URL to Chirp documentation. #5954 (By Jaime Frey )
creator: mvpelletier
